Here is the Social on, nothing else side by side.

![Screenshot_20230107_051043](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/55165479/211176394-8ed8d190-1fae-47e2-988a-c88569bc566b.png)

![Screenshot_20230107_051112](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/55165479/211176400-7cad0467-a5ce-4acb-81b4-186992728f97.png)

![Screenshot_20230107_051345](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/55165479/211176407-75395e3f-b08d-4aec-86ed-547f7d556cbb.png)

To confirm what you can see, there is nothing marked as blocked and the one item that is "modified" is a cosmetic one, not something that would cause breakage. Not sure what's going on and while it is annoying I can disable Adguard on the login page, finish and then turn it back on, defeats the purpose to an extent.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.poli-ground.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.poli-ground.com/index.php](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.poli-ground.com%2Findex.php) ### Comment > This annoyances appears only if you are logged in to the site, not if you are not logged in. > This annoyance pops up a small pop-up in the site and changes the background to a non-clickable black color. > I even succeeded in removing the pop-up by adding user rules, but I couldn't solve the screen changing to black that I couldn't click on. (poli-ground.com###layerTip > div.pop_layer_in:last-child > div.pop_con) > Only manually closing the pop-up can solve this phenomenon. > If closed manually, the website generates the cookies below and does not display the pop-up until the cookies expire. However, it is very cumbersome because the expiration date of cookies is set to 12 hours. > I forced the expiration date of the cookie myself and the phenomenon was resolved. > { > "domain": "www.poli-ground.com", > "expirationDate": 1673240395.736125, > "hostOnly": true, > "httpOnly": true, > "name": "tip_guide", > "path": "/", > "sameSite": "unspecified", > "secure": false, > "session": false, > "storeId": "0", > "value": "Y" > } ### Screenshots
